query: What do I need to do with the Old-Fashioned Flaky Pie Dough? Prepare Old-Fashioned Flaky Pie Dough according to the recipe. After rolling, folding, and dividing dough in half, roll one portion into a 14-inch round. how long do I need to chill the dough for? 2 hours or up to 24 What should I do with the dough after rolling one portion into a 14-inch round? Transfer to a parchment-lined aluminum rimmed baking sheet, cover with plastic, and refrigerate to relax and chill dough, at least 2 hours or up to 24. What should I do with the peaches for the filling? Wash peaches (no need to peel) and cut into 1/2-inch slices. Measure out 18 ounces (3 cups; 510g) in a medium bowl. Enjoy any extras as a snack; do not use more or you will overcrowd the pie. Sprinkle tapioca starch over peaches and toss until well combined. what is the equivalent of 18 oz in grams? 510g what should I combine the peaches in? medium bowl That's done. What's next? Enjoy any extras as a snack; do not use more or you will overcrowd the pie. How should I arrange the peaches on the dough? Arrange peaches in a ring in the center of chilled dough, tiling slices like dominoes and leaving about a 2-inch border of dough all around. how should I arrange the peaches in the dough? dominoes what should I use to cut a series of slits in the border of the dough?
text: Relevant Information: sharp knife Information Type: equipment Instruction: With a sharp knife, cut a series of slits in the border of dough, each running from fruit to edge of dough, spacing them about 5 inches apart. Step: 3. Adjust oven rack to lower-middle position and preheat to 400°F. Arrange peaches in a ring in the center of chilled dough, tiling slices like dominoes and leaving about a 2-inch border of dough all around. Sprinkle sugar on top of peaches and finish with a pinch of salt. With a sharp knife, cut a series of slits in the border of dough, each running from fruit to edge of dough, spacing them about 5 inches apart. Fold each segment of dough over peaches, tugging gently so the edge of each segment tightly overlaps the one that came before. Refrigerate pie while you prepare egg wash, but no longer than 15 minutes.

text: Relevant Information: 1 pound duck Information Type: ingredient Instruction: Score duck skin diagonally every 1/2-inch. Step: 3. Light one chimney full of charcoal. query: How should I prepare the chickpeas for soaking? Rinse chickpeas and place in a large bowl. what do I cover the chickpeas with? cold water How can I ensure the chickpeas have enough room to expand in the water? Cover with cold water, adding enough to allow the chickpeas to at least triple in volume. how do I dry the chickpeas? in a salad spinner What do I need to do with the chickpeas after they have soaked overnight? The next day, drain, rinse, and carefully dry chickpeas in a salad spinner. do I drain the chickpeas the next day? yes do I add garlic to the food processor? yes should I add salt for the bowl in this food processor? yes how long should I pulse the chickpeas? until chickpeas are very finley minced How finely should the chickpeas be minced? Pulse until chickpeas are very finely minced. what do I transfer the mixture into?
text: Relevant Information: 10 g salt Information Type: ingredient Instruction: Combine chickpeas, herbs, scallions, garlic, cumin, coriander, and salt in the work bowl of a food processor. Step: 2. Combine chickpeas, herbs, scallions, garlic, cumin, coriander, and salt in the work bowl of a food processor. Pulse until chickpeas are very finely minced, stopping the food processor to scrape down the sides as necessary. A handful of the mixture squeezed into a ball should be able to barely hold together. If not, process a little more.

text: Relevant Information: mixture Information Type: ingredient Instruction: Using a tablespoon measure, scoop out heaping spoonfuls of the mixture into your hand. Step: 3. Drain potatoes in a colander and let drain for 2 minutes. Should I boil the potatoes on high heat for the entire time? Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook until barely tender, about 5 minutes Alexa what should I use to drain the potatoes? colander Alexa what ingredients must I drain? potatoes What's next after boiling and simmering the potatoes? Drain potatoes in a colander and let drain for 2 minutes. What should I do with the chorizo in the cast iron skillet? Cook, stirring, until chorizo is crisp on all sides and fat has rendered out, about 10 minutes total. Remove chorizo with a slotted spoon to a large bowl, leaving fat in skillet. Set chorizo aside. How do I know when the chorizo is done cooking? chorizo is crisp on all sides and fat has rendered out Alexa what must I put the chorizo in once it is rendered out? large bowl Alexa what ingredient do I remove with a slotted spoon? chorizo Alexa what must I render the fat out of? chorizo What should I do with the potatoes after they are drained? Add 3 tablespoons oil to skillet and heat over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add drained potatoes and cook, stirring and tossing occasionally, until potatoes are deep brown and crisp on all sides, about 20 minutes total. Alexa what must I drain at the beginning of the step? potatoes How should I make the potatoes crisp? Cook, stirring and tossing occasionally, until potatoes are deep brown and crisp on all sides, about 20 minutes total. Alexa what do I toss and stir occasionally while cooking? potatoes What do I do after cooking the potatoes until they are deep brown and crisp? Add cumin and paprika and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Alexa what should be added to the bowl with chorizo in it? potatoes How long should I cook scallion whites and light greens and poblano?
text: Relevant Information: about 2 minutes Information Type: time Instruction: Add scallion whites and light greens and poblano and cook, stirring occasionally, until charred, about 2 minutes. Step: 4. Add remaining tablespoon oil to skillet and heat over high heat until shimmering. Add scallion whites and light greens and poblano and cook, stirring occasionally, until charred, about 2 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper then transfer to bowl with potatoes and chorizo. Toss contents of bowl and return to skillet. Make 4 wells in potato mixture.

query: What should I do to start marinating the chicken? Pat the chicken dry with paper towels. Using a sharp knife, score the top side of the chicken thighs 2 or 3 times, then prick all over with a fork. Place the chicken in a baking dish, ziptop bag, or a food-safe storage container with a lid. what tool do I use to prick the chicken all over? fork what do I use to score the top side of the chicken thighs? sharp knife Where should I place the chicken after scoring and pricking it? Place the chicken in a baking dish, ziptop bag, or a food-safe storage container with a lid. What is the next step after putting all the ingredients in a blender? Pulse until very smooth. what do I need to pour all over the chicken? yogurt What do I need to do after blending the ingredients? Pour the yogurt mixture all over the chicken, then gently toss to coat well. Cover the container or seal the bag and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight. How can I ensure the flavors of the ingredients permeate the chicken effectively? Cover the container or seal the bag and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight. How do I go about pickling the nectarines? Heat a small dry skillet over medium heat. Add the coriander seeds to the hot skillet and toast until the seeds become fragrant and start to darken slightly, about 1 minute. Transfer toasted coriander seeds to a mortar and pestle and crush to a coarse powder. what do I need to heat over medium Heat?

query: what should I cook the chili gravy in?
text: Relevant Information: medium heat Information Type: temperature Instruction: For the Chili Gravy: Heat a heavy 12-inch cast iron skillet over medium heat. Step: 1. For the Chili Gravy: Heat a heavy 12-inch cast iron skillet over medium heat. Cut all the chilies open along one side, so that they can be laid flat. Working in batches, cook chilies in the skillet, pressing down with a spatula, until lightly toasted and fragrant, about 5 seconds on each side; be careful not to let chilies burn. Transfer to a large bowl and cover chilies with hot water, setting a small plate on top to keep them submerged. Let stand 30 minutes.

text: Relevant Information: salt Information Type: ingredient Instruction: Season breast liberally all over with salt and pepper. Step: 3. Light one chimney full of charcoal. When all the charcoal is lit and covered with gray ash, pour out and arrange the coals on one side of the charcoal grate. Set cooking grate in place, cover grill and allow to preheat for 5 minutes. Clean and oil the grilling grate. Score duck skin diagonally every 1/2-inch. Season breast liberally all over with salt and pepper. Place duck breast on hot side of grill, skin side down, and cook until skin has browned and crisped, 5 to 7 minutes. Flip and brown on other side, about 4 minutes. text: Relevant Information: large bowl Information Type: equipment Instruction: In a large bowl, using a stiff rubber spatula, vigorously stir butter and sugar together to form a uniform paste. Step: 1. For the Dough: In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, yeast, baking soda, and salt. Using spatula followed by hands, mix flour and butter mixtures together until even, cornmeal-like mixture forms, 1 to 2 minutes.

The next day, drain, rinse, and carefully dry chickpeas in a salad spinner. when do I drain the chickpeas? the next day why do I put the chickpeas in the salad spinner? dry chickpeas what comes after the scallions? garlic, cumin, coriander, and salt what comes after the coriander? salt what do I pulse in the food processor? chickpeas What's the desired consistency of the mixture after processing? A handful of the mixture squeezed into a ball should be able to barely hold together. What is the purpose of putting the mixture in the refrigerator for 15 minutes? to allow time for more starch to seep out of chickpeas. This will help the balls retain their shape better once formed. what do I put into my hands? mixture How should I shape the balls out of the mixture? Using a tablespoon measure, scoop out heaping spoonfuls of the mixture into your hand. Gently shape each into a ball. what will I not be able to roll the mixture like? dough Can I roll the chickpea mixture like cookie dough when forming the balls? you will not be able to roll the mixture like cookie dough; this is okay. how do I check the oil temperature? instant-read thermometer Done.
